page.title: 07LIFESTYLE..HOME LIFE
page.content: I usually get up at about quarter to eight in the morning and get my breakfast at eight o'clock. I leave the house at quarter past eight and have a game of football before we get in. My school day on a Friday morning consists of reading, maths, basketball and language. Friday afternoon consists of art and drama. We finish at quarter past three. When I get up the road I get changed and go to football training down at the centre. I get back from that at about six o'clock. I watch the television most of the night or I play darts and then I go to bed at about twelve o'clock, because it's Saturday the next day.
